file.name: request_body_oneOf_scenarios.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: RequestBody with AllOf
  description: refComponent
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.{host}.io/v1
    description: The production API server
    variables:
      host:
        default: openapi
        description: this value is assigned by the service provider
  - url: https://{subdomain}.swagger.io:{port}/{basePath}
    description: The production API server
    variables:
      subdomain:
        default: petstore
        description: this value is assigned by the service provider
      port:
        enum:
          - '8443'
          - '443'
        default: '443'
      basePath:
        default: v2
paths:
  /path01:
    post:
      operationId: postXMLUser
      summary: Request Body has nested allOf.
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
      requestBody:
        description: A JSON object containing pet information
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              oneOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cat'
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Dog'

components:
  requestBodies:
    PetBody:
      description: A JSON object containing pet information
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cat'
  schemas:
    Cat:
      type: object
      required:
        - userName
      properties:
        userName:
          type: string
        petName:
          type: string
        isHunt:
          type: boolean
    Dog:
      type: object
      required:
        - userName
      properties:
        userName:
          type: string
        petName:
          type: string
        isBark:
          type: boolean

  #public type Cat record {
  # string userName;
  # string petName?;
  # boolean isHunt?;
  #};

  #public type Dog record {
  # string userName;
  # string petName?;
  # boolean isBark?;
  # };

  #public type  Body Cat|Dog;
